Title: 41149 - # Gadgets to Take on Your Summer Vacation
Direction: 675 words. Create a list of 4-8 gadgets to take on a summer vacation. Things such as digital cameras, GPS devices, smartphones and smartwatches, etc. Your target audience is interested in technology, so write for a tech-minded audience, detailing the specs of the gadgets you recommend. You can link to your target URL in a section the talks about why you would want to take a digital camera on your trip. Make sure you do not discuss any products that are a competitor to Sony.
Anchor Text: best digital camera - branded variation (client name + keywords)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: best digital camera from Sony
